Stargazing

$78

Features 30-35 stems

On a dark summer night, you’re gazing into the midnight sky. You’ve spotted the Big Dipper, Aquarius, but the most beautiful constellation looks a lot like a garden of sparkling Hydrangeas, Garden Roses, Veronicas, and Carnations. All is bright when you’re stargazing.
